title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: Work on building responsive and dynamic user interfaces using React. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality web applications.
company_description: TechNova is a young software company founded in 2018, focused on creating modern web and mobile applications for clients worldwide. They are known for innovations in UI/UX design and an agile approach to development.

title: Backend Developer (FastAPI + MySQL)
description: Develop scalable APIs using FastAPI and manage relational databases with MySQL. Focus on performance optimization and integration with front-end systems.
company_description: DataWorks is a German IT company headquartered in Berlin, founded in 2010. It specializes in data engineering and analytics, providing solutions for large European corporations.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain and improve CI/CD pipelines, manage cloud infrastructure, and ensure system reliability. Strong knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring tools required.
company_description: CloudForge is a Dutch company that has been offering cloud solutions for startups and enterprise clients since 2015. Their services include DevOps outsourcing, automation, and infrastructure optimization.

title: Mobile Developer (Flutter)
description: Design and develop cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter. Work closely with product teams to implement new features and maintain app stability.
company_description: Appify is a global startup developing mobile apps for the e-commerce, fintech, and health-tech industries. Founded in 2020, it already has over 1 million users of its apps.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create user-centered designs, conduct usability testing, and deliver wireframes and prototypes. Collaborate with developers to ensure design accuracy.
company_description: DesignHub is a London-based design agency founded in 2012. They focus on digital design, branding, and UX research for well-known European and American brands.

title: Full Stack Developer (MERN)
description: Work on full stack applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Implement features across front and back end while ensuring scalability.
company_description: WebCraft is a Polish company founded in 2016, focused on developing web applications and e-commerce solutions using modern JavaScript technologies.

title: AI Engineer (NLP)
description: Build and optimize natural language processing models. Work with large datasets and collaborate with linguists to improve accuracy and usability.
company_description: LinguaTech is a French AI startup founded in 2017, specializing in NLP solutions, machine translation, and semantic text analysis.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets, prepare dashboards, and provide insights to support business decisions. Familiarity with SQL and BI tools preferred.
company_description: Insightly is a London-based consulting firm founded in 2014, focused on business intelligence, data analytics, and BI solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises.

title: Security Engineer
description: Identify vulnerabilities, perform penetration testing, and implement security best practices across infrastructure and applications.
company_description: SafeNet is a Swiss company founded in 2008 that focuses on cybersecurity and data protection for the banking and healthcare sectors.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product lifecycle from discovery to delivery. Collaborate with engineering and design teams while managing stakeholder expectations.
company_description: Visionary is a Spanish product management and innovation consulting firm, founded in 2013, helping startups and corporations develop digital products.

title: QA Engineer
description: Design and execute test cases, automate testing frameworks, and ensure product quality through continuous integration pipelines.
company_description: TestLab is a US-based company founded in 2011 that provides QA outsourcing and testing automation for SaaS and gaming industries.

title: Game Developer (Unity)
description: Develop and optimize gameplay mechanics in Unity. Collaborate with artists and designers to bring engaging experiences to life.
company_description: PlaySphere is a Swedish game studio founded in 2015, known for developing mobile and PC games with over 50 million global downloads.

title: Systems Administrator
description: Manage servers, ensure system uptime, and troubleshoot infrastructure issues. Knowledge of Linux and Windows environments required.
company_description: InfraTech is a Czech company founded in 2009, specializing in IT infrastructure and cloud hosting solutions.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design cloud-native architectures, optimize deployments, and provide guidance on scaling and cost management for enterprise clients.
company_description: NextGenCloud is a Danish company founded in 2018 that provides cloud architecture and consulting services for enterprise clients across Europe.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop and deploy ML models for image and data processing. Collaborate with data scientists and integrate solutions into production systems.
company_description: DeepVision is a US-based AI company founded in 2016, specializing in computer vision and deep learning in healthcare and transportation.

title: IT Support Specialist
description: Provide technical support, troubleshoot issues, and assist employees with hardware and software problems.
company_description: HelpDeskPro is an Austrian company founded in 2012, specializing in IT support and outsourcing for small and medium-sized businesses.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Develop decentralized applications, smart contracts, and blockchain protocols. Experience with Ethereum and Solidity preferred.
company_description: CryptoForge is an Estonian company founded in 2019, focused on blockchain solutions, smart contracts, and Web3 applications.

title: Marketing Specialist (Digital)
description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns, manage social media accounts, and analyze performance metrics.
company_description: BrandBoost is a marketing agency founded in 2015, providing digital marketing services for e-commerce and lifestyle brands.

title: Business Analyst
description: Gather business requirements, document processes, and collaborate with technical teams to implement solutions.
company_description: StrategyWorks is an Irish company founded in 2010, specializing in business analytics, digital transformation, and strategic planning.

title: Technical Writer
description: Write and maintain technical documentation, API references, and user manuals. Collaborate with engineers to ensure accuracy and clarity.
company_description: DocuPro is an international company founded in 2014 that specializes in technical writing, documentation, and software product localization.
